item.description:
For those with tricks up their sleeves, this is a card game night!

This is an open card game night.  Whatever suits your fancy from traditional to modern, we'll divide into small groups and play different games at once whether an old favorite or to learn something new.

Some examples of card games people in this group have been known to enjoy are:

  • Hearts
  • Cribbage
  • Wizard
  • Canasta
  • Whist or Bridge
  • Popular trick-taking card games from other countries (Briscola, Skat, Tichu, etc.)
  • Advanced card games (Coloretto, Lost Cities and others from Reiner Knizia)
  • Whimsical card games (Mystery Rummy, Fluxx, Mamma Mia, etc.)

So if you like any of these games or want to learn more about this genre, this event will be for you.  We welcome new players with open arms. I encourage all to bring a deck of cards and/or cribbage boards.

This is an unregulated group event.  There may be multiple games going on at once, so just find one to jump into or get one started when you arrive!

As per the usual policy, we ask everyone to please purchase something from the restaurant so we may continue to support the businesses which provide us with public meeting locations.
item.how_to_find_us: Depending on interest and weather, we may either be sitting outside or in back of restaurant.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Card Game Night in Downtown Salem
